channel.title: Quick Problem
channel.description:
I need help on adding a command that i've never done before..::armour...
I want it to beable to give any armour in the game inside the users inventory.
For example:
User types ::armour
He gets a random set of armour inside his inventory

item.title: Quick Problem
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

Rixxx you dunt understand him he said:

He gets a random set of armour inside his inventory

But your code is that you only get one set,

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("armor")) { int[] armorID = { id, id, id }; for(int i : armorID) { addItem(i, 1); } }

Did you change the id,id,id?

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Problem
item.dc:creator: @sikeo sikeo
item.description:
@sikeo wrote:

That command doesn’t work! Is it because I have a Dodian source?

Help!
